name: Pinocchio (itch)
description:
In a distant future where robots are banned, the mad scientist Dr.Geppetto creates Pinocchio, a cyber boy, to keep him company. The government kidnaps Dr.Geppetto for his crimes and now, it is up to Pinocchio to save him from the danger he is in and become a real boy. Playtime: 5-7min. Compatible with Google Chrome.

⚠️Flash Warning⚠️
